page.title: 02Clubs and Societies
page.content: In Clovelly there are a number of clubs and societies. Here is a list of them:- Football club, Darts club, Skittles Club, Old-Time Dancing, W.I, Social Club, Ladies Lifeboat Guild, British Legion, Playgroup, Fun Club, Clovelly Twinning Society, School Governors, Friends of the School, Sunday School, Beach Clearance, Parish Church Council, Cancer Research and Cancer Relief Societies and pantomime players. Most of these societies meet at the local {Parish Hall}some of them at the { Village School. }The{Parish Hall}is an important{amenity.}There are discos, dances, buffets,bingo,parties, fetes and sales. There is a lack of facilities for school age children. In the summer there are fewer meetings due to people doing seasonal work.
